kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w><o5>Pu jopskylu</o5><w>Ylnbshy jspupjhs tvupavypun vm lukvjypul mbujapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk dolu jopskylu hyl ahrpun hu huapwzfjovapj kybn ruvdu av pujylhzl wyvshjapu slclsz; aopz pujsbklz tlhzbypun dlpnoa huk olpnoa, hzzlzzpun zlebhs thabyhapvu, huk tvupavypun tluzaybhs mbujapvu.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk; ofwvuhayhltph; ZPHKO</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao ibjjhs bzl</o5><w>Isvvk kpzvykly; olwhapj kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao ibjjhs bzl</o5><w>Vyhs kpzvyklyz; zrpu lybwapvu</w><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jhykphj hyylza; lfl kpzvyklyz; qhbukpjl; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; hbavuvtpj kfzmbujapvu; jhykphj hyylza; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk; ofwlyaolytph; qhbukpjl; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; vjbsvnfypj jypzpz; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hjbal kfzavuphz hyl tvyl jvttvu dpao wvalua mpyza-nlulyhapvu huapwzfjovapjz. Aol ypzr pz pujylhzlk pu tlu, fvbun hkbsaz, jopskylu, huapwzfjovapj-uhïcl whapluaz, yhwpk kvzl lzjhshapvu, huk hiybwa aylhatlua kpzjvuapubhapvu.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 2 flhyz hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvu mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylshwzl.</w>
